body_html:
@pedropgusmao Thank you for looking at the PR. I am trying to get a clean build, but seems like some file is missing in master. Is this a known issue?

[1/2] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/cmTC_c7b35.dir/src.cxx.o
FAILED: CMakeFiles/cmTC_c7b35.dir/src.cxx.o
/usr/bin/c++ -DCAFFE2_IS_NUMA_AVAILABLE -std=c++11 -o CMakeFiles/cmTC_c7b35.dir/src.cxx.o -c src.cxx
src.cxx:1:10: fatal error: numa.h: No such file or directory
#include <numa.h>
^~~~~~~~
compilation terminated.

body:
@pedropgusmao Thank you for looking at the PR. I am trying to get a clean build, but seems like some file is missing in master. Is this a known issue?

[1/2] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/cmTC_c7b35.dir/src.cxx.o
FAILED: CMakeFiles/cmTC_c7b35.dir/src.cxx.o
/usr/bin/c++    -DCAFFE2_IS_NUMA_AVAILABLE -std=c++11 -o CMakeFiles/cmTC_c7b35.dir/src.cxx.o -c src.cxx
src.cxx:1:10: fatal error: numa.h: No such file or directory
 #include <numa.h>
          ^~~~~~~~
compilation terminated.
